scenes.text: Your shift is halfway done. You are sitting with your friend Mark just outside the workplace.
You head to the gas station to refuel.
You travel with a goal in mind. Finally... Your vehicle runs out of fuel... It was inevitable.
You keep walking for what felt like days, You have never been this thirsty before in your life,
You ran out of fuel... You keep walking until you find a house. Maybe there is fuel here...
You finally get to rest... you wake up and the storm is gone... just like your car...
You stay on the road for another day... You run out of fuel... and have no money to fuel back up... your only option is walking.
You both run as fast as you can, It takes a couple of minutes of running for your to realize you left behind your car...
You don't pay. Atleast you save some money...
You don't pay. Atleast you save some money...
You sleep just fine... The storm passes. Time to get back on the road!

events.content: Final days of Fall, It's warm for now...
Mark's car, a brand new 1995 model.
He saved forever for this thing...
A new 1995 'Taurus'
I am sitting in the field, it's lunch break... Finally.
I wish Mark could make some choices without always asking me.
I can't believe we only get 20 minute breaks...
I wish I could eat my lunch... but I don't have any...
Maybe I should find someone who can cook...
I don't see myself doing that with this flannel vest on however...
They propably think I can't afford any groceries with it on.
I mean I can't... right now...
Why do you think that is?

dialogue.text: I needed my brand new car...
How else am I gonna get out of this place?
I did study... just not enough... Jackass
There's nothing here anyways, no nice places to work at all...
It's all the fault of the system... I wish I could live off the grid or something
Atleast somewhere far away... where things are new and mysterious

events.content: WE should get out of here!
We can't just stay here forever...
See my car in the back? We could take it right now or wait until summer
We could go right now, or we could go next summer when the weather settles...

scenes.text: You and Mark decide to wait until summer...
You and Mark walk to the car, you head out on the open road...
The sky gets dark, a storm approaches... It's better to get out of the car and stop for a little while.
You are stopped by a large body of water, the sky gets dark, a storm approaches, It's better to spend the night here and wait for the storm to pass...
You refuel the car, you are ready to get back on the road in no-time.
You decide to travel further... until you run out of fuel. Your only option is to scavenge for fuel in the strange machines.

events.content: It's freezing... thankfully it's warmer in the car...
It will only get colder...
WOW! What a monument...
Maybe that's where we should go!
That's what's calling us.
It feels good to be out on the road...
Right?

dialogue.text: Awesome, we can't stop now...
It's to late now to stop.
We are completely free, for the first time...
What's there to have doubts about?

events.content: Where are we going?
Whatever this was... is hasn't been touched for a long time...
I guess that means we are far from home...
Is this what we came for?
What a strange machine...

dialogue.text: These machines were used for battle.
Maybe it could have been a bomb?
Let's keep moving to be safe.
I don't know what it's function was... but it was used for war.
Seems like it's been innactive for a very long time now...
I wonder to who it belonged...

choices.text: I wonder what else is out here.

dialogue.text: I don't want to waste any time not finding out...

events.content: Let's go. We can't spare the fuel anyways.

dialogue.text: Fine... I guess it's nice to stare at.

events.content: What a haunting structure...
It looks very industrial, might be to keep machines cool...
Maybe it's a server room or something.
I can't see a thing trough the snow...
Only makes running away to nowhere better
If you can't read where to go, just go
Looks like we are going to be in trafic for a while...
We could switch seats... I need some rest.

dialogue.text: You switch seats, you are now at the driver's seat
You continue to drive and notice that the fuel is running low...
Better visit a gas station soon...
Suit yourself...

events.content: You are on the road for a few more hours...
As the sky turns grey, it starts cooling down...
This won't go anywhere without fuel...
Better try finding some in these machines.
I hope I don't fall of this thing...
Let's see... where could the fuel storage be...

dialogue.text: I can feel something... a handle
Pull it, it might be a fuel cap.
You twist the handle open, you almost lost your stability...
Your fingers are the first to find out about the fuel inside...
YES! We got fuel!
Great, come on down and let's go.

choices.text: Try punching open a damaged lid

dialogue.text: *METAL CLANG* There's something behind here for sure!
*CLANG* Just one more hit!
*CLUNK* Got it!
You feel a warm sensation on your hand...
Your balance starts to decrease...
You cut yourself badly on the rust...
You fainted and never recovered...

events.content: Can't believe this still has fuel...
You must be careful for the rust...
It could lead to some serious infection.
Don't do anything to risky!
Looks like it might be raining very soon...
We have been driving all day...
It's gonna get dark in a few hours...
We should find some place to go...
We could go for that large structure in the distance...

dialogue.text: We  will probably have to stop somewhere to sleep first, it's very far...
I could use some rest...
Fine, let's drive away from the storm, it looks like it might get heavy.

events.content: We were low on fuel...
If we hadn't refueled we'd be stranded...
We can't pay for this... it's way to expensive!

choices.text: Drive away and refuse to pay

dialogue.text: Let's get out of here!

choices.text: Pay and be a good citizen

dialogue.text: We have to do what's right...

events.content: We are far away from home...
A gas station...
There's more gas stations on the road...
We're propably fine...
Let's keep driving okay?

dialogue.text: Fine... but if we're stuck in even more traffic don't blame me...
I'm sure we won't run out of fuel...

events.content: The weather looks horrible...
Better stay somewhere until the storm passes.
We should rest while the storm passes.
This might be able to protect the car from the rain...
Or it could break apart and damage the car... or us!.

dialogue.text: I hope nothing bad happens...
This should be the better option...

events.content: HEY! WHAT ARE YOU KIDS DOING DOING HERE?!

choices.text: We need some place to sleep

dialogue.text: WHY AREN'T YOU KIDS SLEEPING AT HOME?
We ran away...
YOU ARE LUCKY A BAD STORM IS COMING!
YOU CAN SLEEP HERE BUT YOU BETTER SCOOT WHEN THE SKY CLEARS!
Thank you!

choices.text: We were just about to leave!

dialogue.text: YOU BETTER RUN!
The old man appears to reach towards a weapon of some kind.... you both decide to start running!

events.content: Skrholmen, near Stockholm, we are getting further away from home by the minute...
I'm thankful we are traveling instead of working in a place like that...
Yeah...
We should still figure out where we are going...
We just have to get out of this corporate landscape...
The structure has a giant hole in the center
The reason for that is as mysterious as the thing itself...
It appears to be made out of some kind of rock
But how...
We are in some weird territory now...
Really makes you think...
We should look for the origin of this...
Sounds good. Atleast we have somewhere to go...
This machine appears to have taken damage...
Seems like something must have caused a direct hit on it...
But what... and who?
I cannot believe we ran out of fuel already...
Finding fuel in this thing is our only option...
Look at this thing... We'll never get inside
Even if we could... It's not worth it...
There is no fuel slot anywhere
This might not even have been a ship
Let's just keep moving... We need to find food and water...
We need the water...
And the food...
You know it just as well as I do...
Nobody has to get hurt, It's just for show...

dialogue.text: Fine then I'll do it...
To be continued
Just in and out, that's all it has to be...
To be continued

events.content: There's three ships here for some reason...
All facing the same direction...
There's three ships here for some reason...
All facing the same direction...
You think we can use any of these ships to get your car back?
Even if we could... It's not worth it...
I am not going back to that freak...
Besides... my car is most likely scrap by now...
Let's just keep moving... We need to find food and water...
A giant ship of some kind...
How a normal sized person could fit in here beats me...
Doesn't seem like it still works
